amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike sections 801 which proposes that forest plans not be considered major Federal actions under the National Environmental Policy Act of 1969.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 115-378 to strike sections 801, pertaining to forest plans not condsidered major Federal actions for purposes of section 102 of the National Environmental Policy Act of 1969, and 903, revision of extraordinary circumstances regulations in the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the O'Halleran amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 194 - 226 (Roll no. 595).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. O'Halleran.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the O'Halleran amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 194 - 226 (Roll no. 595).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
